message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a new attention mechanism for neural networks that can be applied to both natural language processing and computer vision tasks. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also introduces a new way of dynamically determining the shape and size of an area, which involves machine learning techniques, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely sub-categories as well. Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed method on two tasks, which suggests that cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) could also be a relevant sub-category.
